title: ELO HELL!!!
body:
What do i do when my team mates start to troll in rank?  
Whats the point in trying if youre going to lose lp...
i think each individual should be based on their perfomance in game even though they lost they still get to win/lose just a small amount of lp

replies.body: The other team has a higher chance of having bad players if you aren't bad yourself. 4/5 chances to 5/5 chances.

Welcome to Elo Hell, and welcome to an idea that I have been trying to push since the start of S6.

There is NO FUCKING REASON you should even bother trying when your team are assholes, AFK, DC, feeding, terrible players or anything else that will give the enemy a free win. You get nothing more or less for being a tryhard in a guaranteed lose than you do if you actually tried to play well.

It is fucking retarded if you ask me. I have had really good games myself, good stats, lots of kills, towers and so on, but I get the same shit LP lose as my c*** of a team who decide they would rather lose.
